nodes.text: Mako was a professional Human male musician who performed with Alitra, Alisia, O'choa Detera and Mestral in the cantina aboard Tansarii Point Station, playing his nalargon in 1 ABY.

Mako was a non-hostile NPC in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. He could be found in the tutorial level on Tansarii Point Station, which was added in the NGE update.
